title: Textblock background
body:
Please add background to TextBlock control.
I would like to have like this: https://i.stack.imgur.com/9op91.png
Instead of this: https://i.stack.imgur.com/hjvme.png.

comments.body: Or a Boolean Highlighted property would be nice.  Anything that we can use in code to indicate to the user that the textblock has focus.
